title: ‘The Circle’ Season 4, an Interview With Rachel and John | Netflix and Spill
description:
The Ringer’s Jomi Adeniran interviews Rachel Evans and John Franklin from Season 4 of Netflix’s ‘The Circle.’ They discuss their strategies during the first four episodes, chat about friendly flirting, and reveal surprising behind-the-scenes insights from their season.
Host: Jomi Adeniran
Guests: Rachel Evans and John Franklin
Producers: Devon Manze and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
